item.description: This is a nice place to have a Sunday morning walk. Afterward, we’ll go to lunch at a local restaurant. Join us! For info, call Gail 860-582-8229. Directions: I-84 to 72E or Rt. 9 to 72W, Exit 7 Corbin Avenue take Rt. 372W to 1st light, turn right onto West Main Street, at 4th light turn right onto Park Place at Walnut Hill Park sign, go to end, turn right and follow road around to other side of park. We’ll meet in 2nd larger parking lot on right.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet in the parking lot.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Walk & Lunch
